attributes.action: SAY NO to NEW STUDENT FEES
attributes.additional_details:
Make a stand - Say NO to the new student fees for subjects that make a difference Science's, Mathematics, English etc. The burden of 40k-60k will stop bright young hopefulls/pioneers from changing and improving our future prosperity.
Save money elsewhere - Bring our troops home from impossible wars that cannot be won.  Turn off street lighting in non pedestrian areas. Reduce the number of constituencies and MP's. Introduce national service for those without work.  Reduce bureaucracy by employing business professionals in local council. Place a cap on law suits against public sector companies - reducing costly court cases.  Introduce a levy on 100k earners if they have hospital or dentisty treatment.
